Record.Description: A commercial combination preparation, by Johnson and Johnson, containing sodium phosphate monobasic and sodium phosphate dibasic with laxative activity. This saline laxative attracts water to the bowel, thereby softening the stool and promoting bowel movement. Fleets Phospho-Soda is used for the treatment of constipation and for bowel cleansing prior to certain tests or surgery of the rectum and colon.
